GnosisGenericMenu.Name: CutCopyPasteGroup

GnosisGenericMenuItem.Tooltip: Cut the highlighted text and place on the Clipboard

GnosisGenericMenuItem.Tooltip: Copy the highlighted text and place on the Clipboard

GnosisGenericMenuItem.Caption: Paste
GnosisGenericMenuItem.Tooltip: Paste the contents of the Clipboard to the selected control at the position of the cursor

GnosisGenericMenuItem.Tooltip: Undo the last change made for the selected Tile

GnosisGenericMenuItem.Name: RedoMenu
GnosisGenericMenuItem.Caption: Redo
GnosisGenericMenuItem.Tooltip: Redo the last undone change for the selected Tile

GnosisGenericMenuItem.Tooltip: Cancel changes to the Document in the selected Tile

GnosisGenericMenuItem.Tooltip: Reset the inputs to the Current Search

GnosisGenericMenuItem.Name: PrintMenu
